subject-English: There is a documented digital vision document incorporating all channels and products.
題目-Chinese: 公司的數位化願景涵蓋所有通路與產品。
構面: 願景

subject-English: Senior management can articulate the digital vision clearly and consistently.
題目-Chinese: 管理階層能清楚一致地表達公司數位化願景。
構面: 願景

subject-English: The delivery of the digital vision forms part of the balanced scorecard at executive level.
題目-Chinese: 數位化願景的執行成果已納入績效考核。
構面: 願景

subject-English: The impact of digital has been quantified on the business over the short and medium term.
題目-Chinese: 公司可量化在數位化過程對短、中期業務的衝擊。
構面: 願景

subject-English: Digital plans and investments are a standard agenda item at executive level (or equivalent).
題目-Chinese: 數位化規劃和投資是一定層級以上經理人的標準議題。
構面: 願景

subject-English: A regular scan of digital innovations is run in our market and challenge our plans accordingly.
題目-Chinese: 公司持續關注同業在數位化創新，並能即時調整既有規劃。
構面: 策略更新及持續性監控

subject-English: There is a lack of consensus around how digital will impact on the business.
題目-Chinese: 公司對數位化所帶來的業務衝擊，缺乏一致地共識。
構面: 數位化在組織中的定位

subject-English: Senior staff play an active role discussing digital issues in the marketplace e.g. keynote speaking or publishing commentary.
題目-Chinese: 資深同仁積極地參與數位議題探討，例如：提供看法或評論。
構面: 數位化在組織中的定位

subject-English: The vision strives to use digital to achieve competitive advantage in our market(s).
題目-Chinese: 公司致力於數位化科技應用，以提升市場的競爭優勢。
構面: 數位化在組織中的定位

subject-English: Digital is a critical consideration in every business, product or channel strategy (i.e. is a mandated consideration).
題目-Chinese: 公司每一項業務、產品或通路策略都將數位化列入關鍵考慮因素。
構面: 數位化在組織中的定位

subject-English: Executives and senior leaders, with a passion for digital, have pushed ahead of their peers in digitising the business.
題目-Chinese: 經理人與高階主管對於數位化懷抱熱情，並成為推動業務數位化的領頭羊。
構面: 數位化在組織中的定位

subject-English: A member of the executive team or senior leadership team is accountable for digital revenue and capability.
題目-Chinese: 在經理人或高階主管團隊中，至少有一位成員負責數位化收入與數位化能力建置。
構面: 數位化在組織中的定位

subject-English: Accountability for digital sits at middle management within the business.
題目-Chinese: 由中階管理階層負擔數位化責任。
構面: 數位化在組織中的定位

subject-English: There is no one within the business accountable for digital.
題目-Chinese: 公司內部沒有人負責數位化。
構面: 數位化在組織中的定位

subject-English: The individual(s) responsible for digital have defined metrics within the balanced scorecard.
題目-Chinese: 公司負責數位化的人員曾定義過平衡記分卡的指標。
構面: 數位化在組織中的定位

subject-English: There is some recognised digital capability within the organisation.
題目-Chinese: 公司組織內部已有一些已知的數位化能力。
構面: 數位化在組織中的定位

subject-English: There is some digital capability within the organisation but the resources are dispersed across the organisation.
題目-Chinese: 公司內部已有一些數位化能力，但數位化資源仍分散。
構面: 數位化在組織中的定位

subject-English: There is a recognised team that manages and improves the digital channel.
題目-Chinese: 有明確的專責團隊管理並改進數位化通路。
構面: 數位化在組織中的定位

subject-English: The digital/eCommerce team drive significant change through the business.
題目-Chinese: 數位化或電子商務團隊於業務中趨動顯著的改變。
構面: 數位化在組織中的定位

subject-English: The digital/eCommerce team is the centre for all digital management, change and innovation.
題目-Chinese: 數位化或電子商務團隊是所有數位化管理、變革與創新的核心。
構面: 數位化在組織中的定位

subject-English: The digital team can deliver significant change through both traditional and agile methods.
題目-Chinese: 數位化團隊能透過傳統與靈活兼具的方法產生顯著的改變。
構面: 數位化在組織中的定位

subject-English: Digital as a distribution channel receives specific funding for improvements.
題目-Chinese: 數位化通路已如一般實體通路，取得具體的資金挹注協助其發展。
構面: 數位化的策略性規劃及投資

subject-English: Digital features as one of the strategic priorities and investment areas for the organisation.
題目-Chinese: 數位化為公司組織內部優先的發展策略與投資領域。
構面: 數位化的策略性規劃及投資

subject-English: Digitally led change follows the same process for gaining funding as any other funding type.
題目-Chinese: 數位化策略的投資計畫符合一般取得資金的程序。
構面: 數位化的策略性規劃及投資

subject-English: Digital receives a greater proportion of funding in relation to channel cost than face to face or telephony channels.
題目-Chinese: 數位化通路能獲得比面對面銷售或電話行銷通路更多的資金挹注。
構面: 數位化的策略性規劃及投資

subject-English: Digital investments have specific criteria relating to speed of deployment and the realisation of benefits.
題目-Chinese: 數位化投資以佈署速度與實現效益作為具體標準。
構面: 數位化的策略性規劃及投資

subject-English: Digital investment cases are well supported by senior stakeholders in the organisation.
題目-Chinese: 數位化投資案受組織內部的主要股東大力支持。
構面: 數位化的策略性規劃及投資

subject-English: Digital investment is ring-fenced year-on-year with provision for innovation.
題目-Chinese: 數位化投資受獨立保障且逐年地提供以作為創新所用。
構面: 數位化的策略性規劃及投資

subject-English: Discretionary funds are available for developing digital ideas and testing through focus-groups/crowd-sourcing engagement models to gauge customer advocacy.
題目-Chinese: 數位化發展計畫具有豐沛資金支援，並且透過焦點團體或網路協作進行實測，以獲得顧客青睞。
構面: 數位化的策略性規劃及投資

subject-English: There is clear and agile governance in place for approving and funding digital ideas.
題目-Chinese: 公司透過明確且靈活的治理方式，核准數位化發展的挹注資金。
構面: 數位化的策略性規劃及投資

subject-English: Digital benefit types and formulas are established to ensure consistent calculation of benefits across the enterprise.
題目-Chinese: 數位化獲利計算方式與公司整體營運獲利公式相符。
構面: 數位化的策略性規劃及投資

subject-English: Digital benefit submissions are reviewed objectively against other initiatives to ensure duplicate benefits are identified and removed before strategic planning is complete.
題目-Chinese: 在策略規劃完成前，數位化效益有被客觀的檢視，避免重複計算。
構面: 數位化的策略性規劃及投資

subject-English: Firm wide management maintain a view of emerging players and technologies in their product markets.
題目-Chinese: 公司的管理風氣為隨時在產品市場保持創新並扮演接受科技新知的角色。
構面: 策略更新及持續性監控

subject-English: There is a dedicated team who scan the market for smaller digital innovators and approach third parties to understand themes and trends.
題目-Chinese: 公司具專職團隊負責檢視市場上小型數位化創新者（如：Fintech）並與其接觸，以理解數位化發展主題與趨勢。
構面: 策略更新及持續性監控

subject-English: Local and business unit level decisions are taken on the digital proposition based on their market knowledge.
題目-Chinese: 公司數位化策略有採納在地與業務單位依其市場知識所做的決定。
構面: 策略更新及持續性監控

subject-English: Clear strategic decisions are taken around acquisitions, partner models or build based on market scanning.
題目-Chinese: 公司基於市場調查結果進行數位化併購或合夥策略。
構面: 策略更新及持續性監控

subject-English: Access to benchmarking data covers all industries to determine best practice.
題目-Chinese: 公司在制定最適方案時，會參考全產業相關的標竿資訊。
構面: 策略更新及持續性監控

subject-English: Standard industry benchmark data is used when making decisions.
題目-Chinese: 公司以標竿同業資訊作為依據，擬訂數位化決策。
構面: 策略更新及持續性監控

subject-English: Benchmarking data is readily available to staff of all levels of the business.
題目-Chinese: 公司每個層級的員工都能清楚衡量標竿數據。
構面: 策略更新及持續性監控

subject-English: Digital functionality and market position is reviewed alongside sales and service MI.
題目-Chinese: 數位化功能和市場定位已納入公司銷售和服務的理念識別中。
構面: 策略更新及持續性監控

subject-English: Digital plans are reviewed alongside the business strategy annually.
題目-Chinese: 數位化規劃隨著公司策略進行定期審查，如每年、每季。
構面: 策略更新及持續性監控
